fullDescription.intro: Hierarchically computes the centroid of a region and divides it into four new subregions. For these four subregions the ratio of pixels in the subregion vs pixels in the whole region is calculated. These four ratios are then added to the feature vector.
fullDescription.option: Defines how many centroids should be calculated. Careful as the number of centroids rises exponentially.
Beginning with which level the relative densitiy should be calculated.
If white should be used as the background color.

ports.inPort: The binary images for which the AHDH feature should be calculated.
